title-group.article-title: Toward Interpretive Pluralism: Literary History and the History of Reading

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2009 New Literary History, The University of Virginia

p.mixed-citation: This paper was delivered in English at the conference on "Literary History in the Global Age" organized by New Literary History at the University of Virginia, Charlottesville, March 14-15, 2008
